department: Department of Public Works and Government Services
description: A bidding opportunity exists for a Natural Resources Canada requirement for two laser Particle Size Analyzers.
full_summary:
=====================================

**Government Tender Announcement**
-------------------------------------

### Contract Information

* **Title (English)**: Particles Laser Size Analyzer PR4942 23254-230481
* **Title (French)**: Analyseur granulométrique Laser PR4942 23254-230481
* **Reference Number**: WS3817123212-Doc4004908238
* **Amendment Number**: 0
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3817123212
* **Publication Date**: May 11, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: May 26, 2023, 2:00:00 PM EDT

### Contract Details

* **Expected Contract Start Date**: July 12, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: February 15, 2024
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)
* **Contact Information**: Daniel Soucy, daniel.soucy@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Notice URL**: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16248267?extsite=MTYyNDgyNjdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Tender Description

The Department of Natural Resources (NRCan) requires two laser Particle Size Analyzers (hereinafter referred to as the "Particle Size Analyzer") to measure the sizes of particles in aqueous solutions. The Particle Size Analyzer must meet all mandatory technical requirements as specified in the tender document.

### Important Changes

Please note that the Closing Time for bid submission has been extended. All required supporting documentation and bids must be submitted by May 26, 2023, at 2:00:00 PM EDT. Late submissions will be declared non-responsive.

### Trade Agreements

This contract opportunity is covered under the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

### Regions of Delivery

* National Capital Region (NCR)

### Predefined Template Status

* **Outstanding Tasks**: None
* **Expiration Date**: May 26, 2023
* **Observed Date
